title: Greece: By 11 Greek Photographers
description: This exhibition contained 42 photographs, which highlighted the people, cities, and landscapes of Greece. As Curator of Photography, Peter Pollack noted, “It is a composite picture of old Greece and new Greece, but above all it is a picture of living Greece by its own photographers, shown outside its native land for the first time.” The eleven Greek photographers with work in the exhibition included: Peter Broussalis, Manolis Diamantis, Nina Emmanuel, Dimitrios Harissiadis, Aris Konstantinidis, Nicholas Kydonieus, Athanasios Michalos, Pavlos Mylof, Demosthenes Patridis, Constantin Roucanis, Demetrios Sotiropulos.
